actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to give preference in employment in certain positions in the Veterans Administration to qualified disabled veterans and veterans of the Vietnam era.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to give preference to qualified disabled and Vietnam era veterans for certain employment in the Veterans' Administration.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to give preference in employment in certain positions in the Veterans Administration to qualified disabled veterans and veterans of the Vietnam era.
